quagga.input.subject: FW: Assignment and Assumption Agreement
quagga.input.body:
Cheryl Nelson
Senior Counsel
EB3816
(713) 345-4693
----- Forwarded by Cheryl Nelson/NA/Enron on 03/30/2001 01:37 PM -----

	"Meytina, Anna Confidential Memo-Counsel (Exchange)" <ameytina@bear.com>
	03/29/2001 01:39 PM
		 
		 To: "'cheryl.nelson@enron.com'" <cheryl.nelson@enron.com>
		 cc: 
		 Subject: FW: Assignment and Assumption Agreement




> -----Original Message-----
> From: Meytina, Anna Confidential Memo-Counsel (Exchange)
> Sent: Thursday, March 29, 2001 2:32 PM
> To: 'Cheryl.Nelson@enron.com'
> Subject: FW: Assignment and Assumption Agreement
>
> Apologies!
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Meytina, Anna Confidential Memo-Counsel (Exchange)
> Sent: Thursday, March 29, 2001 12:21 PM
> To: 'Cheryl.Nelson@enron.com'
> Subject: Assignment and Assumption Agreement
>
> Cheryl:
>
> As discussed, attached please find the revised Assignment and Assumption
> agreement.
>
> Regards,
>
> Anna
>
>  <<Enron Assign& Assumpt.doc>>

 - Enron Assign& Assumpt.doc
***********************************************************************
Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation, solicitation,
offer or agreement or any information about any transaction, customer
account or account activity contained in this communication.
***********************************************************************
